Name: Orinoco cocktail
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with a dusting of cacao powder over the cocktail.
Review: Dry sherry, chocolate and almond add subtle nuances to a base of cachaça and apple juice.
History: Adapted from an originally blended drink created in 2015 by Sergio Padilla at Boca Chica in Barcelona, Spain.
Nutrition: One serving of Orinoco cocktail contains 215 calories
